text_blocks.content: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 759 Filed 08/10/22 Page 185 of 267 2213 LCAVMAX6 A. Farmer - redirect

(In open court) BY MS. MENNINGER: Q. Ms. Farmer, in 2006, you did not want Jeffrey Epstein prosecuted; correct? A. I don't recall that being the case. Q. You didn't want him prosecuted because no crime had been committed; correct? MS. POMERANTZ: Objection. THE COURT: Sustained. MS. MENNINGER: If I may have one moment to confer with my client, your Honor? THE COURT: You may. (Counsel conferred with defendant) MS. MENNINGER: No further questions at this time, your Honor. THE COURT: Ms. Pomerantz? MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, may I just have one moment please? REDIRECT EXAMINATION BY MS. POMERANTZ: Q. Good afternoon, Annie. A. Good afternoon. Q. How, if at all, have you struggled to process your experiences with Maxwell and Epstein? A. I think it's been -- it was a very upsetting and confusing

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear and legible format. There are no visible redactions or damage.
